name: Trap The Squirrel
description:
Try and outsmart Sam the squirrel in this fun, hair-pulling puzzler. Be careful this is one smart squirrel!

Surround the squirrel and don't let him escape by tapping on the rocks to make them sink around him.
Be careful though, he's a very clever squirrel and with every rock that you sink he gets a step closer to escaping.

5 tricky worlds with 50 levels and more to come!

Key features:
• 5 worlds with 50 levels
• Strategy gameplay
• Adorable character
• Free updates and new levels to come

Have fun and we hope you enjoy our game.
